urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

data.text:
بدءاً من 15 مايو، سنقوم بتشغيل 11 رحلة أسبوعياً بين البحرين والقصيم. كما أننا نسيّر رحلاتنا إلى كل من الدمام، والرياض، وجدة، والمدينة المنورة في المملكة العربية السعودية.
إحجز تذكرتك الآن على https://t.co/Vjb5AqIn5i أو عبر تطبيقنا للجوّال.

#طيران_الخليج #البحرين #تميز_نختص_به https://t.co/4o7qxqE5ZQ

Please be advised that your booking has been issued through a travel agent.
In order to process the refund or obtain information on the rules of your ticket, please contact your issuing agent
Thank You

@Nazzzzzz1000 Hi, Farnaz 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿🇵🇰,
Please check Baggage Allowance page on our website for all the baggage details.
https://t.co/n5ZLuv7zxR
Thank You

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

data.text:
@MDSAJJAD110 Hi MUHAMMAD SAJJAD/محمد سجاد/मुहम्मद सज्जाद.!
Thanks for getting in touch with Gulf Air. How can we assist you?

اجتمع رئيس مجلس إدارة طيران الخليج سعادة السيد زايد بن راشد الزياني بالإدارة التنفيذية للناقلة لاستعراض نتائج ومقترحات لجنة التحقيق البرلمانية المتعلقة بطيران الخليج. ووجه سعادته الإدارة التنفيذية على ضرورة العمل بشكل جدي وفوري على دراسة التقرير، واضعة مصلحة الشركة فوق كل اعتبار https://t.co/K5jCgOeU44

أخبار سارّة للمسافرين إلى تايلند والحاصلين على التطعيم! بدءاً من الأول من مايو 2022؛ سيتم إلغاء برنامج الفحص "Test and Go" لدى السفر إلى تايلند، كما أننا سنقوم بزيادة عدد رحلاتنا إلى بانكوك إلى سبع رحلات أسبوعية بدءاً من 16 مايو. 

#طيران_الخليج #البحرين #تايلند https://t.co/6rsWVPPEsy

data.text:
@careme2 Hi Asif Baig!
Thanks for getting in touch with Gulf Air.

Cardboard Boxes are not allowed as cargo or checked in baggage on flights to or from India, Bangladesh, Pakistan or Sri Lanka in any cabin class.

Thank you

@careme2 Dear Asif Baig,,
Thank you for contacting us.
Please be informed that the baggage allowance will vary depending on your ticket fare family, Falcon Flyer membership and final destination.
You may check the link below for more information
https://t.co/n5ZLuv7zxR
Regards,

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.
